helpText: Include antibiotic, dose, and duration. Confirm allergies and local guidelines.
presetDescription: Insert a common regimen and tailor for local guidance, allergies, and renal function.

presets.label: Cefalexin 750 mg PO tds
presets.value: Cefalexin 750 mg orally every 8 hours (alternative dosing when adherence to 6-hourly dosing is unlikely)

presets.label: TMP–SMX 160/800 mg PO bd
presets.value: Trimethoprim–sulfamethoxazole 160 mg/800 mg orally every 12 hours

presets.label: TMP–SMX 320/1600 mg PO bd
presets.value: Trimethoprim–sulfamethoxazole 320 mg/1600 mg orally every 12 hours (for water-immersed traumatic wounds)

presets.label: Dicloxacillin 500 mg PO qid + Ciprofloxacin 500 mg PO bd
presets.value: Dicloxacillin 500 mg orally every 6 hours PLUS ciprofloxacin 500 mg orally every 12 hours (for water-immersed traumatic wounds when trimethoprim–sulfamethoxazole is not suitable)

presets.label: Flucloxacillin 500 mg PO qid + Ciprofloxacin 500 mg PO bd
presets.value: Flucloxacillin 500 mg orally every 6 hours PLUS ciprofloxacin 500 mg orally every 12 hours (for water-immersed traumatic wounds when trimethoprim–sulfamethoxazole is not suitable)
